(Asami) Koushite zettai ni nanimo nai to omotte ita ano otoko ga kyuseishu to natte arawareta
Iya, baito owari de ie de shawaa dake abite sono mama kita kara.
(Asami) Sou nan da, gomen ne hontou ni.

Ah, yatteru yo. Aa sou da.
Kore shinkyoku yokattara kiite.  Aa~ arigatou.
Imamade to wa chotto houkousei ga chigau n da kedo sa.

(Asami) Shou, chuu no doukyuusei da ne.  E? Datte meiku no Misa-chan mo ja nai?
Kantoku ni okuru n de shashin totte moratte ii desu ka?
Ah, ushiro de ii desu.  Ushiro ka.
(Asami) Mou chotto ue kara no yorime mo onegaishimasu.

Fukuda-san, ongaku mo yatterun desu ka?
Socchi no hou ga hongyou nan desu kedo ne.  Hee~.

Posuto ni sa kagi haitteru kara saki haittete.

Ano! Watashi 29-sai nan desu kedo okashikunai desu ka?

Ah, ee~ Kondou Asami-sama desu ne?

lines.romaji: Okashikunai desu ka?  Ah, ano, mochiron onakunari ni nari yasui no wa sanjuudai nan desu kedomo sore wa akumademo kakuritsu no hanashi nanode, touzen sore izen ni onakunari ni naru koto mo aru n desu ne.

(Asami) Ano, koko terebi nai desu ka ne?

lines.romaji: Yokokuhen mo suggoi ii no dekite, yatto ima, korekara honto ni, korekara housou dattan desu yo!
Shokai dake demo mirenai desu ka ne?  Mirenai desu ne.
(Asami) Mirenai no wa shikata nai to shite mo shinda hito no negai o sonna bassari ikimasu ka?
Hajimete tegaketa dorama desu mon ne.
Chinamini jikan-teki ni wa dore kurai desu ka?
(Asami) Ichi jikan desu.  Ah, ichi jikan nan desu ne.
(Asami) Honto, sore dake miretara mou manzoku nan de.
Ah, yon chan nan desu ka.
(Asami) Usuda Asami-san desu.  Ah, Usuda Asami-san.
(Asami) Boutou no honto, atama juppun dake demo ii n de mirenai desu ka ne?  Mirenai desu ne.
Chinamini, zen nan wa desu ka?
(Asami) Muri nan desu yo ne?  Muri desu ne.
(Asami) Sakki kara nande choi choi ato mou hitooshi mitai na kanji de dashite kuru n desu ka?  A, nanika bassari iku na tteâ€¦
(Asami) Mou ii desu yo, datte douse muri nan dakara.
Ee~ Kondou Asami-sama waâ€¦ Ah, kore da.
Hokkaidou no murasaki uni desu ne.
(Asami) Shokuzai to shite no shashin desu yo ne?
Ichiou, kore ga ichiban wakari yasui kana to omoimashite.
(Asami) Shinderu n ja nai desu ka? Kore.
Ichiou, kore ikita mama no shinsen na uni nan desu ne.
(Asami) 'Ikita mama' toka 'shinsen' toka tte iu no mo shokuzai to shite no kotoba desu yo ne?  Aa, suimasen.
Mou ikkai yarinaosemasu ka?  Dekimasu yo.
(Asami) Mada ikeru n desu ne?  Hai.

lines.romaji: Dewa desu ne, kochira migigawa massugu susunde itadakimasu to tobira ga gozaimasu node, sochira kara konyo ni ohairi kudasai.
(Asami) Kore tochuu kara toka tte muri desu yo ne?  Hai?
(Asami) Sasuga ni zero-sai toka kara wa chotto kitsui n de, nandarou, anoâ€¦ seebu shita toko kara mitai na.
(Asami) Koushite jinsei yon shuumoku ga sutaato shita
(Asami) Masaka konna ni yarinaosu to wa omowanakatta
Iikagen tsugi koso wa ningen ni umarekawaritai
Tada ima made no you na ikikata de wa kitto muri da to omou
(Kantoku)Tashika ni furin o soshi suru gurai ja yowai desu yo ne
(Kyakuhonka)Taimu riipu suru imi nai desu mon ne
Motto bakudai na toku o tsumu hitsuyou ga aru
To wa ie, kono jiki ni dekiru koto wa sodatsu koto nomi
(Asami) Ichiou te ga kakaranai you ni doryoku wa shita
Mou natsukashinde iru hima wa nai
Kouen no tsutsuji wa koukyou no mono dakara katte ni mitsu o suttari suru to settou moshiku wa kibutsu sonkai zai ni nacchau n da yo.
Maa futari wa miseinen da shi shiranakatta kara shikatanai to omou kedo, tsugi kara hikaeyou ne.
Kore minna no omocha dakara minna de asobou.
Junban ko, junban koâ€¦ oide, junban ko, junban ko.
Junban ko da kara ne, junban ko.
(Asami) Sanae-chan tte mou yon-sai da yo ne?
